    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentStep

        public void getCurrentStep(java.lang.Integer changeRequestID)
        This method get change request id and set in motion sql action to get the most recent tester step for that change request.
        Parameters:
        changeRequestID - the change request ID Send SQL action to the server in order to get the tester step for the entered change request ID

      • closeChangeRequestStep

        public void closeChangeRequestStep(java.lang.Integer testerStepId,
                                   java.lang.String failReport)
        Close change request step.
        Parameters:
        testerStepId - the tester step id
        failReport - the fail report Send SQL action to the server to close the testing step (by his ID) and also to update the fail report information in the DB

      • advanceChangeRequestStep

        public void advanceChangeRequestStep(java.lang.String nextStep,
                                     java.lang.Integer changeRequestID)
        Advance change request step.
        Parameters:
        nextStep - the next step
        changeRequestID - the change request ID Send SQL action to the server to advance the change request to the following step, Used to advance from "TESTING_WORK" to either "SUPERVISOR_APPOINT_EXECUTION_LEADER" incase the test were resulted in failure. Or to advance from "TESTING_WORK" to "CLOSING_STEP" incase all the tests passed.

      • createNewClosingStep

        public void createNewClosingStep(int changeRequestID)
        Creates new closing step.
        Parameters:
        changeRequestID - the change request ID Send SQL action to create new closing step in the DB for future refreences and logs

      • getResultFromClient

        public void getResultFromClient(SqlResult result)
        Description copied from class: BasicController
        Gets the result from client.
        Specified by:
        getResultFromClient in class BasicController
        Parameters:
        result - - The result recieved from the DB Handles the result as implemented by the non abstract class, should activate the boundary

      • automaticCloseNewTimeExtension

        public void automaticCloseNewTimeExtension(Step testerStep)
        Automatic close new time extension.
        Parameters:
        testerStep - - tester step Send SQL action to the server to close any time extensions requested for this step that are still in the "NEW" status. This method is called upon step finish work, because if it was finished without time extension they were unneccasry and therefore need to be closed without any supervisor action
